author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.3.0.-alpha.21 -- **Goat Star** -- released!

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0-alpha.2

This contains the bounded sweep in withdrawals which is a breaking change to the state transition logic.

Additionally, this release contains very minor changes to configs and documentation for both Capella and 4844
